abstract: Coca-Cola will pay Dr Pepper Snapple Group $715 million for the right to continue selling Dr Pepper drinks once it acquires its North American bottler, Coca-Cola Enterprises.
snippet: Coca-Cola will pay Dr Pepper Snapple Group $715 million for the right to continue selling Dr Pepper drinks once it acquires its North American bottler, Coca-Cola Enterprises.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola will pay Dr Pepper Snapple Group $715 million for the right to continue selling Dr Pepper drinks once it acquires its North American bottler, Coca-Cola Enterprises, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Coke Pours $715 Million Into Dr Pepper Deal
